channel.title: Photos on Inside My Minds Journey
channel.description: Recent content in Photos on Inside My Minds Journey

item.title: Why Photography
item.description: What does it take to be inspired? To feel connected with what you’re doing? This is what photography is for me, or maybe more than that. There was a time where I worked a lot, not smartly but hardly. It was a moment of happiness, a state of flow. But at some point, I felt like this was the only thing that’s happening in my life, it was fun, but I couldn’t get out the feeling of uneasiness, an intuition of doing something.
